title: Dean of the College of Dentistry
field: Dentistry, Educational Leadership, Educational Management, Management, Strategic Management,
job_description: This position will report directly to the Associate Vice President for Academic Affairs.JOB DESCRIPTION:AUIB seeks a strategic, collaborative, values-driven leader to serve as its next Dean of the College of Dentistry. The Dean will set a bold and ambitious vision for AUIB Dentistry that harnesses the talent, creativity, and diversity. The Dean is the administrative and educational head of the College of Dentistry. This position will be responsible for: Recruit and retain the College's faculty and staff in response to programmatic needs and encourage their professional development.In consultation with the chairs/directors of the concerned departments/divisions and appropriate committees, as specified in the policies, recommend to the Associate VP Academic Affairs the appointment, tenure, promotion, retention, sabbatical leave, annual salary increase and retirement actions of any faculty members and administrative officers of the College.Developing the curriculum of the College.Ensuring the effective delivery of the academic programs of the College.Developing a coherent teaching and learning strategy in the
